com.vaadin.tapio.googlemaps.client.overlays

Class GoogleMapInfoWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.tapio.googlemaps.client.overlays.GoogleMapInfoWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GoogleMapInfoWindow
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A class representing a pop-up window with HTML contents. They are often anchored to markers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GoogleMapInfoWindow()
      Instantiates a new info window.
      GoogleMapInfoWindow(String content)
      Instantiates a new info window with the given content.
      GoogleMapInfoWindow(String content, GoogleMapMarker anchorMarker)
      Instantiates a new info window with given content and anchored to a marker.

                           GoogleMapMarker anchorMarker)
        Instantiates a new info window with given content and anchored to a marker.
        Parameters:
        content - The content in HTML.
        anchorMarker - The marker in which the window will be anchored.
